data.eml:eml: The freshwater ostracod (Crustacea) genus Notodromas Lilljeborg, 1853 (Notodromadidae) from Japan, taxonomy, ecology and lifestyle

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith, Robin J., Kamiya, Takahiro (2014): The freshwater ostracod (Crustacea) genus Notodromas Lilljeborg, 1853 (Notodromadidae) from Japan, taxonomy, ecology and lifestyle. Zootaxa 3841 (2): 239-256, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3841.2.4
